lead_paragraph: Keurig announced on Wednesday that it is hiring the chief executive of Pinnacle Foods, Robert J. Gamgort, as its next chief.

headline.print_headline: Pinnacle Foods C.E.O. Named as Next Chief of Keurig
headline.main: Pinnacle Foods C.E.O. Named as Next Chief of Keurig

snippet: Keurig announced on Wednesday that it is hiring the chief executive of Pinnacle Foods, Robert J. Gamgort, as its next chief.
abstract: Keurig will hire Robert J Gamgort of Pinnacle Foods as its next chief executive; Pinnacle shares fall on news.
